name: HTML Basics
description: Introduction to basic HTML concepts.

lessons.name: HTML Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the basic structure of an HTML document.

lessons.name: HTML Tags
lessons.description: Overview of different HTML tags and their uses.

lessons.name: HTML Forms
lessons.description: Working with forms and inputs in HTML.

name: CSS Basics
description: Introduction to CSS for styling web pages.

lessons.name: CSS Selectors
lessons.description: How to use CSS selectors to style HTML elements.

lessons.name: Box Model
lessons.description: Understanding the CSS box model and element layout.

lessons.name: CSS Flexbox
lessons.description: Introduction to flexbox for responsive design.

name: JavaScript Basics
description: Introduction to JavaScript programming.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Introduction to variables and basic data types in JavaScript.

lessons.name: Functions
lessons.description: Understanding how to define and use functions.

lessons.name: Event Handling
lessons.description: Introduction to handling events in JavaScript.

name: Forces and Motion
description: Understanding the relationship between forces and motion.

lessons.name: Newton's First Law
lessons.description: An introduction to Newton's First Law of Motion.

lessons.name: Newton's Second Law
lessons.description: Understanding force, mass, and acceleration.

lessons.name: Newton's Third Law
lessons.description: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.

name: Work and Energy
description: Exploring the concepts of work, energy, and power.

lessons.name: Work Done by a Force
lessons.description: Calculating work done by forces in different scenarios.

lessons.name: Kinetic Energy
lessons.description: Understanding kinetic energy and its relation to motion.

lessons.name: Potential Energy
lessons.description: Exploring gravitational and elastic potential energy.

name: Momentum and Collisions
description: Introduction to momentum and collisions.

lessons.name: Momentum Conservation
lessons.description: Understanding the conservation of momentum in collisions.

lessons.name: Elastic and Inelastic Collisions
lessons.description: Exploring the differences between elastic and inelastic collisions.

lessons.name: Impulse
lessons.description: The relationship between force, time, and change in momentum.

name: Ancient Art
description: Study of ancient art from different civilizations.

lessons.name: Egyptian Art
lessons.description: Understanding the art and architecture of ancient Egypt.

lessons.name: Greek and Roman Art
lessons.description: Exploring the art of ancient Greece and Rome.

lessons.name: Mesopotamian Art
lessons.description: An overview of the art from Mesopotamian cultures.

name: Medieval Art
description: Exploration of art during the medieval period.

lessons.name: Christian Iconography
lessons.description: Understanding the use of religious symbols in medieval art.

lessons.name: Gothic Architecture
lessons.description: Study of Gothic architecture and its features.

lessons.name: Renaissance Beginnings
lessons.description: Introduction to early Renaissance art and architecture.

name: Modern Art
description: Exploring the art movements from the 19th and 20th centuries.

lessons.name: Impressionism
lessons.description: Understanding the Impressionist movement and its impact.

lessons.name: Cubism
lessons.description: Exploring the development and influence of Cubism.

lessons.name: Surrealism
lessons.description: An overview of the Surrealist art movement.

name: Cell Biology
description: Study of the structure and function of cells.

lessons.name: Cell Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the various components of cells and their functions.

lessons.name: Cell Division
lessons.description: Introduction to the process of cell division and reproduction.

lessons.name: Cellular Respiration
lessons.description: Exploring how cells produce energy through respiration.

name: Genetics
description: Introduction to genetic inheritance and DNA.

lessons.name: Mendelian Genetics
lessons.description: Understanding the basic principles of inheritance.

lessons.name: DNA Structure
lessons.description: Exploring the structure and function of DNA.

lessons.name: Genetic Mutations
lessons.description: Introduction to genetic mutations and their effects.

name: Ecology
description: Study of ecosystems and environmental interactions.

lessons.name: Ecosystem Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the structure of ecosystems and their components.

lessons.name: Food Chains
lessons.description: Exploring the flow of energy through food chains and food webs.

lessons.name: Biodiversity
lessons.description: The importance of biodiversity in ecosystems.

name: Introduction to World History
description: A survey of major historical events from ancient times to the present.

lessons.name: Ancient Civilizations
lessons.description: A study of the early civilizations in Mesopotamia and Egypt.

lessons.name: The Middle Ages
lessons.description: Exploring the major events of the Middle Ages.

lessons.name: The Renaissance
lessons.description: The cultural and intellectual revival of Europe.

name: Modern World History
description: Exploration of significant events in modern history.

lessons.name: The Industrial Revolution
lessons.description: Impact of the Industrial Revolution on society.

lessons.name: World War I
lessons.description: Causes and consequences of World War I.

lessons.name: World War II
lessons.description: The global impact of World War II.

name: Contemporary World
description: Understanding contemporary global issues.

lessons.name: Globalization
lessons.description: The process and impact of globalization.

lessons.name: The Cold War
lessons.description: Political tension between the US and the Soviet Union.

lessons.name: Post-Colonialism
lessons.description: The effects of decolonization on modern nations.

name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: Basic concepts of chemical reactions and atomic structure.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the structure of atoms and elements.

lessons.name: Chemical Reactions
lessons.description: An overview of different types of chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Periodic Table
lessons.description: Introduction to the periodic table and element properties.

name: Bonding and Interactions
description: Explore the different types of chemical bonding.

lessons.name: Ionic Bonding
lessons.description: Understanding how ionic bonds form and behave.

lessons.name: Covalent Bonding
lessons.description: An introduction to covalent bonding and molecular structure.

lessons.name: Intermolecular Forces
lessons.description: Study of Van der Waals forces and hydrogen bonding.

name: Chemical Thermodynamics
description: Exploring the principles of chemical thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the laws of thermodynamics in chemistry.

lessons.name: Enthalpy and Entropy
lessons.description: Understanding enthalpy, entropy, and free energy.

lessons.name: Gibbs Free Energy
lessons.description: Exploring Gibbs free energy and spontaneous reactions.

name: Introduction to Geography
description: Study of the physical features of the Earth.

lessons.name: Landforms
lessons.description: Exploring different landforms and their creation.

lessons.name: Climate Zones
lessons.description: Understanding climate zones and their effects on regions.

lessons.name: Water Bodies
lessons.description: Study of oceans, rivers, lakes, and their importance.

name: Human Geography
description: Exploration of human impact on the environment.

lessons.name: Urbanization
lessons.description: Understanding urban development and its effects.

lessons.name: Agriculture
lessons.description: Exploring agricultural practices and their impact.

lessons.name: Population Growth
lessons.description: Study of population growth and its environmental consequences.

name: Geographical Tools
description: Introduction to geographical tools and technologies.

lessons.name: Maps and Projections
lessons.description: Understanding map projections and their uses.

lessons.name: Geographic Information Systems (GIS)
lessons.description: An introduction to GIS and its applications.

lessons.name: Remote Sensing
lessons.description: Study of remote sensing technologies and their uses in geography.

name: Algorithm Basics
description: Introduction to algorithms and their real-world applications.

lessons.name: Sorting Algorithms
lessons.description: Learn about different sorting techniques.

lessons.name: Search Algorithms
lessons.description: Understanding search algorithms and their efficiency.

lessons.name: Graph Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to algorithms for graph traversal and search.

name: Advanced Data Structures
description: Explore advanced data structures and their applications.

lessons.name: Binary Trees
lessons.description: Introduction to binary trees and their operations.

lessons.name: Heaps and Priority Queues
lessons.description: Understanding heaps and priority queues.

lessons.name: Hashmaps
lessons.description: Exploring hashmaps and their real-world usage.

name: Algorithm Optimization
description: Learn how to optimize algorithms for better performance.

lessons.name: Time Complexity
lessons.description: Understanding time complexity and Big-O notation.

lessons.name: Space Complexity
lessons.description: Exploring space complexity and how to reduce memory usage.

lessons.name: Greedy Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to greedy algorithms and their use cases.
